channel.title: About on Yu Yamashita
channel.description: Recent content in About on Yu Yamashita

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Hi, I’m Yu Yamashita! I am currently doing a research internship at the Max Planck Institute for Security and Privacy (MPI-SP), where I am advised by Asia J. Biega. Before MPI-SP, I received a Bachelor of Arts in Library and Information Science from the University of Tsukuba in 2023. Education The University of Tsukuba, Japan B.A. in Library and Information Science, Apr. 2018 - Mar. 2023 Advisor: Atsuyuki Morishima
